title: Dishonorable
body: I am dishonorable.. I get 2-3 honors every game and I cant get out.. ? what is this how to get out?

replies.body: It takes a really long time to go from one Honor level to another. Continue being honorable and you will eventually ascend.

Hi All,
I'm facing the same problem, but in reality i don't care so much.
I know actually that i am toxic, mainly cause i'm jungler and my toxicity don't come from my play style, usually when my teammate dies early i just say "care / play safer / i'll gank soon / setup gank and i'm omw / freeze the lane bro i'm coming / wait for my ganks) and even if he still dying 1v1 after 3 deaths and continue to play aggressive with 3 levels behind. 
Few minutes after ... useless jungler, fucking retard jungler, gank you asshole enemy jungler camping me, report this useless jungle.
Found a Solution ... MUTE ALL
One day in champ select, Hi guys i'm extremely toxic so i'm gonna mute all and focus on the game, ping me to communicate. I carried that game and did something like 16/4. In Post Game Screen Hey WTF Jungle Why do you mute and don't communicate we are reporting you for your behaviour.
And i got chat banned for 25 games and Honor = 0
So finally Honor System is for those who don't have Honor IRL.
{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
stop being toxic, you get reported far more than you get honors.
I just had a yi top.. didn't say anything.. so proud.. -.-
i had a top laner get solo killed and he started to flame twisted fate for not ganking. Funny thing is, there was no twisted fate in either team. So proud I kept my mouth shut bro
